info.title: Personal Relationships API
info.description: API for the management of contacts, their relationships to prisoners and restrictions.

tags.name: Contacts
tags.description: Endpoints for creating and managing contacts.

tags.name: Prisoner relationships
tags.description: Endpoints for creating and managing the relationships between contacts and prisoners.

tags.name: Restrictions
tags.description:
Endpoints for creating and managing restrictions. Two kinds of restrictions are supported:
 - Estate wide restrictions (known as global or contact restrictions), which apply to all the contact's relationships.
 - Prisoner-contact restrictions, which apply to a specific relationship between a prisoner and a contact.
There are also restrictions that can apply to a prisoner (and all of their relationships) but these are not supported here.

tags.name: Reference data
tags.description: Endpoints for accessing the reference data used in this service

tags.name: Migrate and sync
tags.description: Endpoints for migrating and synchronising data to and from NOMIS

tags.name: Sync admin
tags.description: Endpoints use by synchronisation for administrative purposes

post.description:
Requires role: PERSONAL_RELATIONSHIPS_MIGRATION.\n" +
      "Used to merge a prisoner's restrictions records with another prisoner's restrictions.\n" +
      "Deletes all restrictions from the removed prisoner and resets the retained prisoner's restrictions to those in the request."

get.summary: Get the prisoner contact restrictions
get.description:
Get the restrictions that apply for this relationship.
      
      This includes prisoner-contact restrictions for this specific relationship only and any global (estate-wide) restrictions for the contact.
      
      If the prisoner and contact have multiple relationships, the prisoner-contact restrictions for the other relationships will not be returned.

parameters.name: prisonerContactId
parameters.description: The id of the prisoner contact

404.description: The Prisoner contact relationship was not found.

401.description: Unauthorised, requires a valid Oauth2 token

post.description: Creates a new prisoner contact restriction for the specified prisoner contact relationship

parameters.name: prisonerContactId
parameters.description: The id of the prisoner contact relationship

201.description: Created the prisoner contact restriction successfully

400.description: The request has invalid or missing fields

404.description: Could not find the the prisoner contact relationship this prisoner contact restriction is for

401.description: Unauthorised, requires a valid Oauth2 token

post.summary: Get the prisoner contact restrictions for one or more prisoner contacts where matches are found
post.description:
Get the restrictions that apply for this relationship.
      
      This includes prisoner-contact restrictions for this specific relationship only and any global (estate-wide) restrictions for the contact.
      
      If the prisoner and contact have multiple relationships, the prisoner-contact restrictions for the other relationships will not be returned.
